Posts.Content: Well had my 1st chemo session Monday and tues was a breeze. Yesterday and today wide awake with funny headache.... before this week I very rarely took a tablet so am concerned what to do as have had that many this week for appetite sickness etc
Posts.Title: Headache

Posts.Content: Thanks so much for your reply (apologies for my late response as had a crappy weekend) hopefully getting more get up and go! Headaches went replaced by the most horrendous heartburn.......rang the hospital and they've prescibed medication. Feeling more positive xx
